00029 int ORHeader::GetDataId(std::string dataObjPath) const
00030 {
00031   std::string fullDataObjPath = std::string("dataDescription:") + dataObjPath + ":dataId";
00032   ORDictValueI* dataIdDVI = (ORDictValueI*) LookUp(fullDataObjPath);
00033   if(dataIdDVI == NULL) {
00034     ORLog(kWarning) << "GetDataId(): couldn't find data id for data object path "
00035                     << dataObjPath << " (full header path was "
00036                     << fullDataObjPath << ")" << std::endl;
00037     return ORVDataDecoder::GetIllegalDataId();
00038   }
00039   return dataIdDVI->GetI();
00040 }
00041 
00042 
00043 int ORHeader::GetRunNumber() const
00044 { 
00045   ORDictValueI* runNumDictVal = (ORDictValueI*) LookUp("Run Control.RunNumber");
00046   if (runNumDictVal == NULL || !runNumDictVal->IsA(ORVDictValue::kInt)) {
00047     ORLog(kError) << "GetRunNumber(): Couldn't read run number from header; returning 0" << std::endl;
00048     return 0;
00049   }
00050   return runNumDictVal->GetI();
00051 }
